versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Explores how to make ideas more unique and competitive

schema.prompt:
Analyze how to make the idea more unique and competitive in the marketplace:

Idea Strengths: {{input.ideaStrengths}}
Market Analysis: {{input.marketAnalysis}}
Competitor Analysis: {{input.competitorAnalysis}}
Target Market: {{input.targetMarket}}
Current Positioning: {{input.currentPositioning}}

Develop differentiation strategies:

1. Competitive Gap Analysis:
   - Unmet customer needs
   - Market white spaces
   - Competitor weaknesses
   - Innovation opportunities
   - Positioning gaps

2. Differentiation Vectors:
   - Feature differentiation
   - Quality differentiation
   - Service differentiation
   - Brand differentiation
   - Experience differentiation

3. Blue Ocean Opportunities:
   - New market creation
   - Value innovation
   - Industry boundary redefinition
   - Customer segment expansion
   - Alternative use cases

4. Unique Value Creation:
   - Novel value propositions
   - Unexpected combinations
   - Cross-industry inspiration
   - Technology leverage
   - Business model innovation

5. Competitive Moats:
   - Barrier creation strategies
   - Switching cost development
   - Network effect potential
   - Data advantages
   - Ecosystem lock-in

6. Positioning Strategies:
   - Market category creation
   - Niche domination
   - Premium positioning
   - Disruptive positioning
   - Collaborative positioning

7. Innovation Angles:
   - Technology innovation
   - Process innovation
   - Business model innovation
   - Customer experience innovation
   - Social innovation

8. Implementation Tactics:
   - Quick differentiation wins
   - Long-term differentiation build
   - Communication strategies
   - Market education needs
   - Partnership opportunities

Return as structured JSON with keys: gapAnalysis (object), differentiationVectors (array), blueOceanOpportunities (array), uniqueValueCreation (array), competitiveMoats (array), positioningStrategies (array), innovationAngles (array), implementationRoadmap (object).

props.placeholder: Output from strength finder with identified strengths...
How the idea is currently positioned or perceived

translations.description: Analyzes competitive landscape to develop differentiation strategies and unique positioning
translations.instructions: Enter idea strengths and market analysis. The system will identify differentiation opportunities and develop strategies for competitive advantage.
translations.name: Differentiation Analyzer
